messages.content: ComfyUI_VisualAttentionMap is a custom node in ComfyUI that allows users to utilize VisualAttentionMap for generating and displaying attention maps.
You can install ComfyUI_VisualAttentionMap either by using the recommended ComfyUI Manager or by manually cloning the repository from GitHub and restarting ComfyUI.
What is the purpose of the HF ModelLoader node in ComfyUI_VisualAttentionMap?
The HF ModelLoader node in ComfyUI_VisualAttentionMap is used to load hf format model weights.
What does the Text2Image Inference node in ComfyUI_VisualAttentionMap do?
The Text2Image Inference node in ComfyUI_VisualAttentionMap performs inference and saves the attention map.
How can I display the attention map using ComfyUI_VisualAttentionMap?
You can display the attention map using the Show Images node in ComfyUI_VisualAttentionMap.
What is the purpose of the Show CrossAttn Map node in ComfyUI_VisualAttentionMap?
The Show CrossAttn Map node in ComfyUI_VisualAttentionMap is used to extract and display the cross attention map.
What does the Show SelfAttn Map node in ComfyUI_VisualAttentionMap do?
The Show SelfAttn Map node in ComfyUI_VisualAttentionMap extracts and displays the self attention map.
